attributes.action: stop international aid until economic growth has reached 5%
attributes.additional_details:
To stop all international aid until the economy is growing by 5%, especially to India; and to use the money that has been saved by not giving international aid, to be used on the NHS, The police force, the military and to in need people in the UK.
Why should we be making cuts in all sectors and be giving aid to the second fastest growing economy?
Lets sort out the UK before any other country.
